verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Song. A Psalm.) Shout <WH7321> joyfully <WH7321> to God, <WH430> all <WH3605> the earth; <WH776>
Sing <WH2167> the glory <WH9202> of His name; <WH8034> Make <WH7760> His praise <WH8416> glorious. <WH9202>

Say <WH559> to God, <WH430> "How <WH4100> awesome <WH3372> are Thy works! <WH4639> Because of the greatness <WH7230> of Thy power <WH5797> Thine enemies <WH340> will give <WH3584> feigned <WH3584> obedience <WH3584> to Thee.
"All <WH3605> the earth <WH776> will worship <WH7812> Thee, And will sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to Thee; They will sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to Thy name. <WH8034>" Selah. <WH5542>
Come <WH1980> and see <WH7200> the works <WH9282> of God, <WH430> [Who is] awesome <WH3372> in [His] deeds <WH5949> toward <WH5921> the sons <WH1121> of men. <WH120>
He turned <WH2015> the sea <WH3220> into dry <WH3004> land; <WH3004> They passed <WH5674> through the river <WH5104> on foot; <WH7272> There <WH8033> let us rejoice <WH8055> in Him!

He rules <WH4910> by His might <WH1369> forever; <WH5703> His eyes <WH5869> keep <WH6822> watch <WH6822> on the nations; <WH1471> Let not the rebellious <WH5637> exalt <WH7311> themselves. Selah. <WH5542>
Bless <WH1288> our God, <WH430> O peoples, <WH5971> And sound <WH8085> <WH6963> His praise <WH8416> abroad,
Who keeps <WH7760> us in life, <WH9132> And does not allow <WH5414> our feet <WH7272> to slip. <WH4131>
For Thou hast tried <WH974> us, O God; <WH430> Thou hast refined <WH6884> us as silver <WH3701> is refined. <WH6884>
Thou didst bring <WH935> us into the net; <WH9287> Thou didst lay <WH7760> an oppressive <WH4157> burden <WH4157> upon our loins. <WH4975>

Thou didst make men <WH582> ride <WH7392> over our heads; <WH7218> We went <WH935> through fire <WH784> and through water; <WH4325> Yet Thou didst bring <WH3318> us out into [a place of] abundance. <WH7310>
I shall come <WH935> into Thy house <WH1004> with burnt <WH5930> offerings; <WH5930> I shall pay <WH9608> Thee my vows, <WH5088>
Which <WH834> my lips <WH8193> uttered <WH6475> And my mouth <WH6310> spoke <WH1696> when I was in distress. <WH9496>

I shall offer <WH5927> to Thee burnt <WH5930> offerings <WH5930> of fat <WH4220> beasts, <WH4220> With the smoke <WH7004> of rams; <WH352> I shall make <WH6213> [an offering of] bulls <WH1241> with male <WH6260> goats. <WH6260> Selah. <WH5542>
Come <WH1980> [and] hear, <WH8085> all <WH3605> who fear <WH3372> God, <WH430> And I will tell <WH5608> of what <WH834> He has done <WH6213> for my soul. <WH5315>
I cried <WH7121> to Him with my mouth, <WH6310> And He was extolled <WH7311> with my tongue. <WH3956>
If <WH518> I regard <WH7200> wickedness <WH205> in my heart, <WH3820> The Lord <WH136> will not hear; <WH8085>
But certainly <WH403> God <WH430> has heard; <WH8085> He has given <WH7181> heed <WH7181> to the voice <WH6963> of my prayer. <WH8605>
Blessed <WH1288> be God, <WH430> Who <WH834> has not turned <WH5493> away <WH5493> my prayer, <WH8605> Nor <WH3808> His lovingkindness <WH2617> from me.
